entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Sheet Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 p.m. ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 10:10 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing rain or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches developing near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:10 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Showers beginning in the evening and ending before morning. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 10:10 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
